Interface IArtDbContext

    • Method Detail

      • createSapQuery

        void createSapQuery(CriticalAccessQuery query)
             throws java.lang.Exception
        This method writes the results of an already executed sap query to the local database. All referenced table entries are also created.
        Parameters:
        query - the query to be inserted into local database
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - caused by unauthorized access (e.g. missing privileges, wrong login credentials, etc.)

      • createConfig

        void createConfig(Configuration config)
           throws java.lang.Exception
        This method creates a new configuration in the local database. No referenced table entries are created.
        Parameters:
        config - the configuration to be inserted into local database
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - caused by unauthorized access (e.g. missing privileges, wrong login credentials, etc.)

      • getFilteredPatterns

        java.util.List<AccessPattern> getFilteredPatterns(boolean includeArchived,
                                                  java.lang.String wildcard,
                                                  java.time.ZonedDateTime start,
                                                  java.time.ZonedDateTime end,
                                                  java.lang.Integer limit)
                                           throws java.lang.Exception
        This method applies the given filter options to an access pattern query. Include archived / wildcard / datetime range / limit are applied if not null (with AND linkage).
        Parameters:
        includeArchived - a flag that indicates whether the archived whitelists are also included
        wildcard - the wildcard string that is searched in several text attributes of whitelists
        start - the lower limit of the whitelist creation timestamp to be filtered
        end - the upper limit of the whitelist creation timestamp to be filtered
        limit - the limit of records returned
        Returns:
        a list of whitelist matching the given filter options
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • getFilteredWhitelists

        java.util.List<Whitelist> getFilteredWhitelists(boolean includeArchived,
                                                java.lang.String wildcard,
                                                java.time.ZonedDateTime start,
                                                java.time.ZonedDateTime end,
                                                java.lang.Integer limit)
                                         throws java.lang.Exception
        This method applies the given filter options to a whitelist query. Include archived / wildcard / datetime range / limit are applied if not null (with AND linkage).
        Parameters:
        includeArchived - a flag that indicates whether the archived whitelists are also included
        wildcard - the wildcard string that is searched in several text attributes of whitelists
        start - the lower limit of the whitelist creation timestamp to be filtered
        end - the upper limit of the whitelist creation timestamp to be filtered
        limit - the limit of records returned
        Returns:
        a list of whitelist matching the given filter options
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • getFilteredCriticalAccessQueries

        java.util.List<CriticalAccessQuery> getFilteredCriticalAccessQueries(boolean includeArchived,
                                                                     java.lang.String wildcard,
                                                                     java.time.ZonedDateTime start,
                                                                     java.time.ZonedDateTime end,
                                                                     java.lang.Integer limit)
                                                              throws java.lang.Exception
        This method applies the given filter options to a sap query. Include archived / wildcard / datetime range / limit are applied if not null (with AND linkage).
        Parameters:
        includeArchived - a flag that indicates whether the archived whitelists are also included
        wildcard - the wildcard string that is searched in several text attributes of whitelists
        start - the lower limit of the whitelist creation timestamp to be filtered
        end - the upper limit of the whitelist creation timestamp to be filtered
        limit - the limit of records returned
        Returns:
        a list of whitelist matching the given filter options
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • getRelatedFilteredCriticalAccessQueries

        java.util.List<CriticalAccessQuery> getRelatedFilteredCriticalAccessQueries(CriticalAccessQuery query,
                                                                            boolean includeArchived,
                                                                            java.lang.String wildcard,
                                                                            java.time.ZonedDateTime start,
                                                                            java.time.ZonedDateTime end,
                                                                            java.lang.Integer limit)
                                                                     throws java.lang.Exception
        This method selects all already executed sap queries from the local database. The filters are applied as in the getFilteredCriticalAccessQueries() method.
        Parameters:
        query - the query to be related to
        includeArchived - determines whether archived records are also loaded
        wildcard - the wildcard string that is searched in several text attributes of whitelists
        start - the lower limit of the whitelist creation timestamp to be filtered
        end - the upper limit of the whitelist creation timestamp to be filtered
        limit - the limit of records returned
        Returns:
        a list of already executed sap queries
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - caused by unauthorized access (e.g. missing privileges, wrong login credentials, etc.)

      • updateConfig

        void updateConfig(Configuration config)
           throws java.lang.Exception
        This method updates all properties referenced in the config. If the config has already been used in sap queries, the history flag is set and the changes are applied to a new
        Parameters:
        config - the config to be updated
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - caused by unauthorized access (e.g. missing privileges, wrong login credentials, etc.)

      • deleteConfig

        void deleteConfig(Configuration config)
           throws java.lang.Exception
        This method deletes an existing configuration from the local database. Referenced table entries are not deleted. If the config has already been used in sap queries, the history flag is set instead of deleting.
        Parameters:
        config - the configuration to be deleted
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - caused by unauthorized access (e.g. missing privileges, wrong login credentials, etc.)

      • deletePattern

        void deletePattern(AccessPattern pattern)
            throws java.lang.Exception
        This method deletes an existing access pattern from the local database. Referenced table entries are also deleted. If the pattern has already been used in sap queries, the history flag is set instead of deleting.
        Parameters:
        pattern - the access pattern to be deleted
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - caused by unauthorized access (e.g. missing privileges, wrong login credentials, etc.)

      • deleteWhitelist

        void deleteWhitelist(Whitelist whitelist)
              throws java.lang.Exception
        This method deletes an existing whitelist from the local database. Referenced table entries are also deleted. If the whitelist has already been used in sap queries, the history flag is set instead of deleting.
        Parameters:
        whitelist - the whitelist to be deleted
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - caused by unauthorized access (e.g. missing privileges, wrong login credentials, etc.)

      • deleteSapConfig

        void deleteSapConfig(SapConfiguration config)
              throws java.lang.Exception
        This method deletes an existing sap configuration from the local database. Referenced table entries are also deleted. If the sap configuration has already been used in sap queries, the history flag is set instead of deleting.
        Parameters:
        config - the sap configuration to be deleted
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - caused by unauthorized access (e.g. missing privileges, wrong login credentials, etc.)

        void createDatabaseUser(DbUser user,
                        java.lang.String password)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
        This method adds a new database user with rights according to the given role.
        Parameters:
        user - the account data of the new database user
        password - the password of the new database user
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - caused by unauthorized access (e.g. missing privileges, wrong login credentials, etc.)
